name: Kaspresso
shortDescription: Kaspresso is a framework for native UI testing. Based on Espresso and UI Automator, it provides a wide range of additional useful features, such as flakiness control and faster execution of UI Automator commands.
longDescription: Kaspresso is a framework for native UI testing. Based on Espresso and UI Automator, it provides a wide range of additional useful features, such as flakiness control and faster execution of UI Automator commands.
